mean_cn: n. 前景，展望，视野，景象；  vi. 勘察，有前途；  vt. 勘探，对……进行仔细调查，寻找
mean_en: the chances of being successful; reasonable hope that something will happen
word_etyma: pro向前，在前+spect看→向前看→前景
deformation_desc: 神秘的水晶球可以预测你的未来哟！
sentence: Since I've graduated from college, my job prospects are great.
sentence_trans: 因为我是大学毕业生，所以我的就业前景非常好。
